= undo last checkin =
* svn merge -r HEAD:PREV path

= revert to revision =
* svn merge -r HEAD:xxxx path

= up to revision =
* svn up -r xxxx path

= show log =
* svn log -l10 -v
* svn log -rBASE -v

= show diff =
* svn log -rBASE --diff

= switch workingcopy =
* svn switch http://server/proj/branches/branch1 --ignore-ancestry --force
